data.comment: Watford kick-off the first half - the match is underway!
Goal! Christian Kabasele heads Watford into a 1-0 lead.
In the minute 14, Great finish from Troy Deeney to give Watford a 2-0 lead.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
Matthew Olosunde is replacing Jamie Lindsay for Rotherham at Vicarage Road.
In the minute 46, The second-half has commenced. Rotherham with the kick-off.
Billy Jones (Rotherham) gets a yellow card.
Will Hughes is replacing Tom Cleverley for the home team.
In the minute 69, The home team have replaced Troy Deeney with Joao Pedro. This is the second substitution made today by Vladan Ivic.
The away team replace Billy Jones with Florian Jozefzoon.
Michael Ihiekwe (Rotherham) has received a yellow card from Josh Smith.
In the minute 79, Paul Warne (Rotherham) is making a third substitution, with Trevor Clarke replacing Daniel Barlaser.
Paul Warne is making the team's fourth substitution at Vicarage Road with Mikel Miller replacing Kyle Vassell.
The away team have replaced Michael Smith with Freddie Ladapo. This is the fifth substitution made today by Paul Warne.
In the minute 84, Vladan Ivic (Watford) is making a third substitution, with James Garner replacing Ken Sema.
That's full-time at Vicarage Road. The final score is 2-0.
Watford make their fourth substitution with Ben Wilmot replacing Kiko Femenia.
Domingos Quina is on a sub for Ismaila Sarr for Watford.
